title: Spacious 2 bedroom with a beautiful pool and 24hr fitness center!!
app_fee: $75 APP FEE + $300 HOLD FEE TOWARDS YOUR DEPOSIT
posting_body: DIVE RIGHT INTO A FRESH BEGINNING AT ROYALTON GREENS!
Located in the heart of beautiful Strongsville, Ohio!
It's a place to relax, shop till you drop, enjoy fine dining, engage in recreational activities AND we are a place for you to call HOME!
Stroll through our park-like community, hike in the FABULOUS Metroparks, take a toboggan ride and warm your toes with a mug of hot cocoa!
You can immerse yourself in the beauty of Ohio's four distinct Seasons (plus the STRONGSVILLE EVENT SEASON).
Enjoy the many amenities we have to offer and take some time to connect with neighbors, friends, and family!
In our backyard, LITERALLY, you can find History, Education, Recreation and Friendship!
It is all waiting for you!
Royalton Greens Apartments is now offering this Spacious 2 Bedroom Suite for $1,075 per month + utilities..
• Gas and electric and set up by the resident
• Gas and electric are metered and paid by the resident/individual thermostats
• Large outdoor pool with picnic and grilling areas and a volleyball court
• Community/Gathering Room with WIFI and Cable TV
• On-Site Management and Local Corporate Management
* Tennis, basketball, baseball and football fields
* A child's dream playground/play areas/ picnic areas and covered gazebo
AS ALWAYS APARTMENT HOMES ARE ON A FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS SO..............
